title: Millennium Problem Intake – Riemann Hypothesis
description: Capture structure for analytical, geometric, or computational claims concerning the Riemann Hypothesis routed through Prism research infrastructure.

researcher_id.description: Stable identifier for the submitting researcher or collaboration cell.

submission_timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp recorded when the intake file is generated.

approach_class.description: High-level category signalling the strategy being pursued.

critical_line_focus.description: Indicates whether the submission concentrates on zeros on the critical line.

description.description: Narrative statement of the primary functional identity or argument.

formal_expression.description: LaTeX or plaintext rendering of the central equality, inequality, or transform.

domain_constraints.description: Statement of the domain or contour on which the identity is claimed to hold.

reference.description: Cited lemma, theorem, or conjecture supporting the identity.

dependence_on_prior_results.description: Foundational statements the submission depends upon.

key_identity.description: Central mechanism claimed to advance the Riemann Hypothesis.

analysis_tracks.description: Tracking for each analytical path supporting the submission.

verification_range.description: Range of imaginary parts of s for which computations were executed.

methodology.description: Algorithms or libraries used to generate the numerical evidence.

numerical_support.description: Computational experiments relevant to the claim.

logic_agent.description: Identifier for the Gödel consistency agent consulted.

findings.description: Summary of contradictions or confirmations reported.

godel_cross_checks.description: Consistency reviews performed within the Prism ecosystem.

location.description: Resolvable link or storage reference for the artifact.

citation.description: Bibliographic reference relevant to the claim.

relationship.description: Short note describing how the cited work connects to the submission.

related_work.description: Prior art acknowledged by the submitter.
